game.name: Love Bird
game.shortDescription: The next hit reality dating show is here, and YOU are the star! Your job? Win hearts, stir drama, charm the nation—or crash and burn while trying. Can you make memorable TV, uncover the secrets hidden behind the scenes, and still find romance in the chaos?
game.shortDescriptionEn: The next hit reality dating show is here, and YOU are the star! Your job? Win hearts, stir drama, charm the nation—or crash and burn while trying. Can you make memorable TV, uncover the secrets hidden behind the scenes, and still find romance in the chaos?
